projects.title: SAP Sales Cloud
projects.description: The largest project I worked on as Tech Consultant for SAP. Designer and developer for SAP's implementation of Callidus CPQ into SAP's Cloud Platform using a variety of technologies. Became Certified as a CPQ Specialist and a SAP Cloud Platform Integration Certified Developer. Highlights: Creating REST APIs to have data flow to/from the Sales Cloud and SAP CRM/ERP; Customizing the CPQ implementation using Python/Javascript for backend scripting/APIs and KnockoutJS/HTML for UI developments; Developing Automated Test Scripts for SDLC Agile Testing processes using different infrastructures Selenium/Jenkins/Catchpoint.
projects.tooltip: Proprietary Information - Cannot share any code/official pictures

projects.title: NBA Machine Learning Model V2
projects.description: Personal Project - Using NBA statistics over the course of the last decade, a Machine Learning model was trained using AWS Amazon Sagemaker in order to predict statistics for future games. Using a separate proprietary web scraping web app, NBA stats over the past decade were retreieved for every game played. After retrieving and configuring all the advanced statistics from the Web Scraping app, the data was used to train a Machine Learning Model on AWS Amazon Sagemaker. The predictions of the Model are used against the corresponding Vegas Odds. Various thresholds are used to determine the optimal chances of the model being more accurate than Sportsbooks.

projects.title: Pytorch AI - Pet Celebrity Lookalike
projects.description: Personal Project - Find your pet's celebrity look-alike! This web application allows users to upload pictures of their pets and discover which celebrities their pets resemble the most. Users can upload pictures of their pets through the user-friendly interface. The application uses a pre-trained machine learning model to compare the features of user-uploaded pet images with features extracted from pictures of celebrities.The application displays the top celebrity look-alikes for the uploaded pet image along with a similarity score. Users can scroll or click through different celebrity look-alike suggestions. Technologies Used: Frontend=React;Backend=Node.js, Express, Python; Machine Learning Model= PyTorch/ResNet18, trained on a dataset of 18,000 pet & celebrity images. Also see backend repo: https://github.com/mbooch22/pet-celebrity-lookalike-backend

projects.title: SAP - AESAP
projects.description: Lead Solution Architect and Sole Owner for this SAP Innovation Project. Designed, Developed and delivered a strict Go-Live for a native iOS app, as a sales tool for over 1,000 account executives/users. Using SAP's Cloud Platform HANA as a DB, a Java persistence API was built to be consumed by both an SAPUI5(XML/Javascript MVC Framework) application (for Key Users to edit KPI Data) and an iOS application for the End Users.
projects.tooltip: Proprietary Information - Cannot share any code/official pictures.

projects.title: Senior Design Project
projects.description: As part Villanova University's Senior Design Project for Engineers, my team of 3 designed and implemented a reservation system to automate reservations made through a website and dipslay the relevant information (If the current time was booked and by who, An option to reserve the current time, Calendar/Schedule for the day) on LED Displays. Using the Google Calendar API, the reservation information was fetched from raspberry pi's every 5 minutes using NodeJS and displayed using React.
projects.tooltip: Only pictures/video I had left from Project. No central repo was used so code is left on the school computer.

projects.title: 3D Printing - Crypto
projects.description: Personal Project/Hobby designing 3D objects in AutoCAD to be printed on my 3D Printer. One such project was printing a display box for an ardunio to display the latest Crypto Currency Prices after being fetched from an API. Used Raspberry Pi and Octoprint software to set up wireless printing as well as video monitoring remotely.
